template.name: Arcserve UDP VM Backup Check
template.description:
## Overview
**Zabbix-Template Arcserve UDP VM Backups**
This template checks out-of-the-box only VM Backups from Arcserve UDP. This script only counts the number of successful or unsuccessful backup jobs and throws a trigger if necessary.
Installation steps für Arcserve UDP VM Backup checks:
1. Copy the script file "Arcserve\_UDP\_VMCount.ps1" to your Zabbix Agent Script folder on the Arcserve UDP Host. 2. Modify script parameter if necessary (protocol, port, JobID) 3. Test the script manually on the Arcserve UDP Host: `.\Arcserve_UDP_VMCount.ps1 JobSuccessCount` 4. For debugging of errors you can enable "$Debug=$True" in the script.. 5. Check the script for correct results of the VM backup jobs. 6. Add the UserParameter to the zabbix\_agentd.conf: UserParameter=custom.arcserveudpvm[*],powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -file "C:\Program Files\Zabbix Agent\Scripts\Arcserve\_UDP\_VMCount.ps1" $1 $2 $3 $4 $5 7. Import des Zabbix Template "Template\_Arcserve UDP VM Backup Check.xml" to the Zabbix Server. 8. Assign the template to the Zabbix host for ARcserve UDP. 9. Modify the macro "{$ARCSERVE\_DOMAIN}", "{$ARCSERVE\_USER}" and "{$ARCSERVE\_PASS} with the read only user login for Arcserve UDP. 10. Check the latest value of application "ArcserveUDP Jobs".
## Author
R.P.Wimmer

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobCancelledCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobCancelledCount from VM Backups

trigger.name: Arcserver UDP VM Backup cancelled
trigger.description: Arcserve VM Backup VM Backup cancelled count.

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobFailedCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobFailedCount from VM Backups

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobIdleCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobIdleCount from VM Backups

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobIncompleteCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobIncompleteCount from VM Backups

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobInProgressCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobInProgressCount from VM Backups

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobMissedCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobMissedCount from VM Backups

dependency.name: Arcserver UDP all VM Backup missed
dependency.expression: {Arcserve UDP VM Backup Check:custom.arcserveudpvm[{$ARCSERVE_DOMAIN},{$ARCSERVE_USER},{$ARCSERVE_PASS},"JobMissedCount",{$ARCSERVE_HOST}].last()}>0 and {Arcserve UDP VM Backup Check:custom.arcserveudpvm[{$ARCSERVE_DOMAIN},{$ARCSERVE_USER},{$ARCSERVE_PASS},"JobSuccessCount",{$ARCSERVE_HOST}].last()}=0

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobOtherCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobOtherCount from VM Backups

trigger.name: Arcserver UDP VM Backup other
trigger.description: Arcserve VM Backup VM Backup other count.

item.name: Arcserve UDP JobSuccessCount
item.description: Arcserve UDP JobSuccessCount from VM Backups

item.description: Arcserve UDP JobWaitingCount from VM Backups

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} - ArcserveBackup - UDP-Verwaltungsport-Freigabedienst
trigger.description: The Arcserve UDP-Verwaltungsport-Freigabedienst service is not running on this server.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} - ArcserveBackup - Event Log Watch
trigger.description: Then Arcserve Event Log Watch service is not running on this server.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} - ArcserveBackup - UDP-Verwaltungsdienst
trigger.description: The Arcserve UDP-Verwaltungsdienst service is not running on this server.

trigger.description: The Arcserve UDP-Agent-Dienst service is not running on this server.

trigger.description: The Arcserve UDP-RPS-Port-Freigabedienst service is not running on this server.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} - ArcserveBackup - UDP-RPS-Datenspeicherdienst
trigger.description: The Arcserve UDP-RPS-Datenspeicherdienst service is not running on this server.

trigger.expression: {Arcserve UDP VM Backup Check:custom.arcserveudpvm[{$ARCSERVE_DOMAIN},{$ARCSERVE_USER},{$ARCSERVE_PASS},"JobMissedCount",{$ARCSERVE_HOST}].last()}>0 and {Arcserve UDP VM Backup Check:custom.arcserveudpvm[{$ARCSERVE_DOMAIN},{$ARCSERVE_USER},{$ARCSERVE_PASS},"JobSuccessCount",{$ARCSERVE_HOST}].last()}=0
trigger.name: Arcserver UDP all VM Backup missed
trigger.description: Arcserve UDP all VM Backup are MISSED count.
